meaning: Fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
sentence: The speaker delivered an eloquent speech that moved the audience.

meaning: To introduce new ideas or methods
meaningNepali: नयाँ विचार वा विधिहरू प्रस्तुत गर्नु
sentence: The company aims to innovate in the field of renewable energy.

meaning: Able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
sentence: Children can be remarkably resilient in the face of adversity.

meaning: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise
sentence: Her meticulous planning ensured the event went off without a hitch.

meaning: Open to more than one interpretation; not having one obvious meaning
sentence: The instructions were ambiguous, leading to confusion among the team.

meaning: The ability to understand and share the feelings of another
meaningNepali: अन्यको भावना बुझ्न र साझा गर्ने क्षमता
sentence: Empathy is crucial for building strong relationships.

meaning: To combine different ideas, influences, or objects into a coherent whole
meaningNepali: विभिन्न विचार वा वस्तुहरूलाई मिलाएर एकत्रित गर्नु
sentence: The scientist was able to synthesize various theories into a new model.
Her candid feedback was appreciated by her colleagues.
Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.

meaning: To make (suffering, deficiency, or a problem) less severe
sentence: The medication helped alleviate her pain.
